description:
Princess Melonia has a new need: a rare, potent, beautifying skin cream from the large, intimidating, infamous monster called the Krapen. Chup is on it! He wrangles his posse, and the gang reluctantly accepts this probable fool’s errand. With help from a multilingual mermaid pop star, the group attempts to snag Kranel No. 2 Xtreme Moisturizing Cream for Chup’s No. 1 lady love.
Source: crunchyroll
